name: TIC Green Sight
description:
Just a workbench to aquire some skill with lua using TIC Computer. Stopped development after I've lost the direction. Held here as a warning: never start to develop if you're not sure of what you want to do :)

Nevertheless I've enjoyed the journey

It's a sort of multiplayer arena man vs man. Never tested with a human being.

Player 1 use arrows + X= Shield + Z=Laser eyes

Player 2 use RDFG + S=Shield + A=Laser eyes

Yellow hotspot will recharge you ammo

Keep UP pressed and your jetpack will kick in
